text:
Everyone show some :orange_heart: to <@U03MLCLS5BN>!! 

She has been working on an update collections page for the APIs and man it is coming together nicely!! 

It's truly awesome!! 

Keep up the amazing work Hannah!

<https://www.postman.com/HubSpot/workspace/HubSpot-public-apis/overview|https://www.postman.com/HubSpot/workspace/HubSpot-public-apis/overview>

Thank you! DevRel (my team and I) have some more exciting news to share about Postman in the upcoming weeks. We are working on a new integration to ensure that collections are always up-to-date and exploring authentication methods to onboard new developers. Additionally, we are creating some new content to help newbies start testing our APIs more easily. Stay tuned for more updates! :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you <@U03MLCLS5BN> this is going to be awesome. And a great platform for us to build on to optimize the dev on-boarding.
